title: Salmon Puffs with Tzatziki
ingredients: ['Salmon Puffs', '375g pack ready-rolled puff pastry', '160g skinless salmon fillet, cut into 1-2cm squares', '120g frozen broad beans', '25g fresh fennel or dill, chopped', '25g snipped fresh chives', '1 egg, beaten', '100g ricotta cheese', 'Tzatziki', '1/2 cucumber', '200g Greek-style yoghurt', '1 garlic clove, crushed (optional)']
